$eref.description: Specifies relationships between the current document and an external resource.
$eref.title: link

___href.description: A URL. Specifies the location of the linked document.

___type.description: Specifies the media type of the linked document.

___title.description: Provide additional / advisory information (expand on the meaning of the link).

___method.description: Specifies how to send the data (e.g. get, post).

___rel.description: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document.

___link.description: A self referencing link to the activity.

___responsibleParty.description: A reference to the party that performed the action on the resource. This could be the username of the User who performed the action. This could also be a reference to the party (e.g. Organization) that accessed the API endpoint to perform the action on the resource.

___action.description: The action being performed in the activity (e.g. CREATED, UPDATED, DELETED, ARCHIVED, etc.).

___relatedResources.description: An array of references to resources also related to this activity.

$eref.description: A reference to a resource, including it's ID, type, and a link to retrieve the resource.
$eref.title: resourceReference

___link.description: A link for accessing the resource.
___link.title: URL Link

___type.description: Specifies the type for the referenced resource.

$eref.description: A reference to a resource, including it's ID, type, and a link to retrieve the resource.
$eref.title: resourceReference

___link.description: A link for accessing the resource.
___link.title: URL Link

___type.description: Specifies the type for the referenced resource.

___targetResource.description: A reference to the resource affected by the activity.

___message.description: An activity message which may be used to supply addition information regarding the activity.

___actionTime.description: The date and time the action took place.

___id.description: A unique ID for the activity.
